## Description {#details}

Collect all loops in function at the same nest level, starting at the outermost level.

This data structure collects all loops at the same nest level for a given function (specified by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> object). It starts at the outermost level.

Definition at line 499 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp">LoopFuse.cpp</a>.
